name: PoshVine
tag_list: online-restaurant-reservations, preferred-pricing, restaurant-deals, culinary-delights, select-experiences, dining-adventures
overview: PoshVine is a social marketplace to discover, book and offer unique foodie experiences. On one hand, PoshVine provides insider access to the best dining destinations in your city where you enjoy benefits like savings, preferred access to Chef’s Tasting tables, etc. On the other hand, passionate people from the community can offer unique experiences and interesting things to do which help locals and travelers discover a city better and differently. Experiences range from unique hikes, pop-up dining experiences, culinary masterclasses, gourmet safaris, exotic adventures and more.

funding_rounds.source_description: Poshvine raises Seed funding from Myfirstcheque
